scenario.title: Title: Covid information Narrative: As a person at particular risk of Covid-19, I wish to know what policies and supports are in place so that I can get the most from UL without too much risk Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Covid-19 Banner
scenario.step: Given As a person at particular risk of Covid-19
Given that the UL website is loaded
And the banner at at the top cycles to "Covid-19 updates"
Then the University Covid-19 information page will load. Scenario 2: Covid-19 Disability Information
Given that the UL Student Disability Service webpage is loaded.
When I click the "Covid-19 on Campus" link
Then A webpage with supports offered to students with disabilities will be loaded Scenario 3: Covid-19 Student Support
Given that the UL Student Disability Service webpage is loaded.
When I click the "Support for Students through Lockdown" link
Then a webpage requesting my student log in details will load
